  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from django.conf import settings
  4. def get_default_language(language_code=None):
  5. """Returns default language depending on settings.LANGUAGE_CODE merged with
  6. best match from settings.CMS_LANGUAGES
  8. Returns: language_code
  9. """
  11. if not language_code:
  12. language_code = settings.LANGUAGE_CODE
  14. languages = dict(settings.CMS_LANGUAGES).keys()
  16. # first try if there is an exact language
  17. if language_code in languages:
  18. return language_code
  20. # otherwise split the language code if possible, so iso3
  21. language_code = language_code.split("-")[0]
  23. if not language_code in languages:
  24. return settings.LANGUAGE_CODE
  26. return language_code
  28. def get_fallback_languages(language):
  29. """
  30. returns a list of fallback languages for the given language
  31. """
  32. conf = settings.CMS_LANGUAGE_CONF
  33. if language in conf:
  34. l_list = conf[language]
  35. else:
  36. languages = settings.CMS_LANGUAGES
  37. l_list = []
  38. for lang in languages:
  39. l_list.append(lang[0])
  40. if language in l_list:
  41. l_list.remove(language)
  42. return l_list
